lines.text: [MUSIC]
Last time on Gun City, the Temple of TehPenguin of Doom.
The boys finally reach the last room of the Land Caves where they met with the handsome winged gamer.
After defeating him in tic-tac-toe, they were rewarded with a dark Eldritch Boppet that they drove the DM insane with.
So I assume they eventually solved it, leading to the Boppet transforming into an egg,
then hatching into a golden penguin with a realistic-looking vagina,
with strange, tinny blizzard noises coming from it.
Pennsylvania Jim, lurking nearby, saw the whole affair,
and sicced his ninja crayons on our heroes,
with new colors pink, yellow, and green.
After Patrick Yoda's new dark side powers quickly dispatched of them,
along with Ray William Johnson's patented sexual grenades and Blowtorch's deadly... pipes,
Jim destroyed the land caves with deadly explosives.
That's why I didn't want to save that game twice.
And our heroes had to narrowly escape before it all came crashing down around them.
Finally arriving from the mouth of the now-destroyed land cave,
the gang was faced with a row of Ken Bone police officers, along with the Gadd King himself,
who noted the group's tardiness (they were only allotted an hour's time in the cave)
as well as the cave's destruction.
Thinking quickly, the three archaeologists, along with Sullivan the Frog,
hopped onto three Walmart scooters sitting outside of the cave.
